Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to introduce our musicians.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, let the concert begin!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much for that wonderful
performance! Let's give a warm round of
applause to these fine musicians!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This concludes this year's <RED>concert</RED>. I hope you all
had a pleasant afternoon.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much for coming. We hope to see
you again next year!
